ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: This 3D Chart demo shows how to add Wavefront *.obj to the SciChart3DSurface using our BaseSceneEntity type
ExampleDefinition.Description:
This 3D Chart demo shows how to add Wavefront *.obj files to the SciChart3DSurface using our [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Primitives.BaseSceneEntity%601.html']BaseSceneEntity type[/url]
Entities may be added to the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.IViewport3D~RootEntity.html']SciChart3DSurface.Viewport3D.RootEntity[/url], which is a type of [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Primitives.BaseSceneEntity%601.html']BaseSceneEntity[/url]. Several objects are created and added to the scene. Some are transparent, some are opaque. Internally SciChart uses order-independent transparency algorithm to draw entities back to front so that transparency appears correctly to the user.
